entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reading compressed encrypted Stream 60x slower on Net6 than Net Framework #83909
  • [API Proposal]: bigdecimal #83907
  • NativeAOT size conscious authoring observations #83902
    Future
  • Platform_TimeZoneNames failing for Iran time zones on macOS #83901
  • [NativeAOT] Rare stress crash due to unwalkable transition frame capturing a hijacked return address. #83900
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAot] Rare deadlock when two threads try to suspend runtime #83898
    8.0.0
  • [android] .NET 8 performance regression in System.Reflection.MethodInfo/ConstructorInfo.Invoke() #83893
    8.0.0
  • Add VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension support in mono #83891
  • Underutilization of TimerQueue when application runs with CPU affinity #83890
  • Wrong cancellation token raised by `StreamPipeReader.ReadAsync` and `ReadAtLeastCore` #83885
  • [wasm] Implement new intrinsics for Vector128 methods #83884
    8.0.0
  • mono gc hangs on ppc64le .net builds #83879
  • [HTTP/3] Alt-Svc logic has many issues #83874
    Future
  • LINQ Array Performance #83871
  • Remove SyntaxTree rooting from interop source generators #83870
    8.0.0
  • Console.CancelKeyPress does not working properly #83869

Closed

  • [Wasm] Out of bounds memory access in System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles tests #83214
    8.0.0
  • .net 8 Failed SSL Connection at andoird api 21 download #82514
  • System.OutOfMemoryException when allocating jump stub on macOS ARM64 #83818
  • Stack overflow static abstract interface methods, and struct types #78866
    8.0.0
  • DebuggerTests.AsyncTests.DebuggerTests.AsyncTests.InspectLocalsWithSameNameInDifferentScopesInAsyncMethod_CSharp times out #83449
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort has no IntelliSense documentation #79030
    6.0.x
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicPlatformDetectionTests.SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue #82055
    8.0.0
  • MetadataLoadContext: IsValueType: NotSupportedException: Modified types do not support this member #83679
    8.0.0
  • [3.1] Deadlock during EventPipe session stop #51579
    Future
  • Blazor WASM closes/chrashes when starting debugging session with breakpoints #83785
  • Could not load file or assembly 'mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0'...... in System.Resources.ResourceManager .NET6.0 #83730
  • Required and init only property custom setters are ignored for source gen #83878
  • mono gc: assert on !sgen_concurrent_collection_in_progress #83817
    8.0.0
  • [TestFailure] Listener_BacklogLimitRefusesConnection_ParallelClients_ClientThrows_Slow fails on ARM #82769
    Future
  • Handling callbacks with the LibraryImport source generator #82017
  • Static executable on Alpine Linux published with gcc is failing #83791
  • IsAssignableFrom isn't working with generic interfaces and classes #83858
  • [globalization] Get CultureInfo.NumberFormat may throw IndexOutOfRangeException #83764
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: import entire method for OSR, prune unneeded parts later #83910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Fixes for two rare stress issues. #83908
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix a read-out-of-local error in the MD library. #83906
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update the hardcoded dotnet-version with channels #83905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #83899
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-author-action
  • Libraries area pod updates for March 2023, plus some fabricbot maintenance #83897
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd bit shift intrinsics #83896
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Convert JIT\Regression tests to merged test groups #83895
    test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • Prepare ComInterfaceGenerator for going into the public API #83894
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Exclude a source-gen test project from NativeAOT #83881
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix false PASS JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/DivConst.cs #83880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Disable test failing on bad Alt-Svc header #83876
    area-System.Net.Http
  • WIP #83873
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83819
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve incremental handling in regex generator #83868
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [LSRA TP]: Skip free heuristics if no free registers are available #83569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix for issue #78866 and regression test #83697
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [mono][jit] Disabled SIMD operator intrinsics on arm64. #83889
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [mono][jit] Increased max length of OP_STOREX_MEMBASE to 16 on arm64. #83887
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix null dereference when logging enabled on 32-bit platforms in HostCodeHeap::InitializeHeapList() #83875
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replace load with cheaper move instr for stack loads on Arm64 (Followup of #83458) #83886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Exclude PInvoke with function pointer in TimeZoneTests from wasm compilation #83805
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • Convert JIT\Directed tests to merged test groups #83256
    test-enhancement
  • [wasm] Work around NuGet-Migrations issue #83832
    area-Build-mono
  • Dump Jit flags textually in mcs #83865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add note to doc about not specifying `hostfxr_initialize_parameters::dotnet_root` #83802
    area-Host
  • Move version.cpp out of hostcommon - only used by hostpolicy #83864
    area-Host
  • enable SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue on arm32 Ubuntu #83799
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Handle custom modifiers on parameter constraints #83850
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Disabled SIMD operator intrinsics on arm64. #83888
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update Microsoft.Build.* SDKs #83877
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [workload] Fix using empty RuntimeIdentifier in LibraryBuilder AutoImport.props #83835
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update PartitionerStatic.cs #83867
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • eng/SourceBuild.props: when unset, let the repo determine RuntimeOS. #82546
    community-contribution
  • [mono][sgen] Remove outdated assertion #83824
    area-GC-mono
  • [QUIC] Fix failing parallel tests #83687
    area-System.Net
  • Explicitly require `.eh_frame_hdr` section #83866
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [mono][debugger] Trying to fix dereference null pointer #83849
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • More precise fix for #83792 #83856
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Updating Unix to save/restore Avx512 state #83784
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add lowering for As*() and dependent methods. #83861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for arm64 #83740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reimplement DacStackReferenceWalker and DacHandleWalker #83836
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable EVEX support by default #83648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimization on LinearScan::buildPhysRegRecords #83862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #83854
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Stop creating "location" commas #83814
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Implement checking for Requires* on attributes for NativeAOT #83550
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix trimming of `LegacyExports` with `WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop` #83664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Implement the STJ.DisableDefaultReflection feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.6
  • Provide support for exposing .NET classes to COM through source generation #83755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add additional close statuses in ManagedWebSocket #83827
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Persist FPU variables across try_compile passes #83206
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only call base.DisposeAsync on classes derived from FileStream #82874
    area-System.IO
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #81115
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add ability specify core_root when run #82387
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • [RISC-V] Port Mono for RISC-V 64 Arch (2/3) thunk & tramponlie #83715
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix JSON required read-only properties used as parametrized ctor #78152
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Generalize handling of commas in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Issue 83667 #83820
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Drop extra files from ReferenceCopyLocalPaths #83670
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf{Not}Equal #83853
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #83776
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Modernize XmlUTF8TextWriter with u8/inline out's. #75812
    area-Serialization, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add MstatDump to runtimelab #2238

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement support for lazy virtual tables #2224
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix warnings and use LLVM helpers for EH dispatchers #2226

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • when i install dotnet 8 preview maui dotnet 6 disappear #31296
  • I can't seem to install .net sdk on my Ubuntu 22.04 environment #31444
  • GenAPI produces invalid source code for record properties #31024

Updated

  • "dotnet pack" does not build #12160
    Discussion
  • [Bug]: Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets(176,5): error MSB4018: The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly. #30755
  • dotnet publish multiple -r options #6490
    Backlog
  • Method '[MSBuild]::GetTargetFrameworkIdentifier' not found #14106
  • dotnet watch run --no-hot-reload stops watching for file changes #30140
  • dotnet publish is slow #10182
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for new output path format #31454
    untriaged
  • Containers: added e2e containers tests for console app #31450
    untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Insert vstest 17.6 GA version #31447
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [Blazor] Enable custom icu loading #31446
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable containers publishing #31432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • bump version of the SDK container support to the latest release #31410
    untriaged
  • Code optimization in containers tests #31443
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Backport] Blazor configuration for StartupMemoryCache and Jiterpreter for 8.0 Preview 3 #31435
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Move dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31302
  • Blazor configuration for StartupMemoryCache and Jiterpreter #31174
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2143550 #31394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adding locked messages as there is overlocalization in at least 5 of … #31421
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0130 refactoring sometimes also want to change other things in the document such as change variables to var #67480
  • [API proposal] Option for displaying standalone parameter names #67478

Closed

  • C# compilation fails: Process terminated. System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException #67091
    C# 12.0
  • GetDocumentationCommentXml gives different comments for same ISymbol #67477

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ExtractInterface to use IRefactoringHelpersService #67482
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow missing placeholders and locals in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor (#67092) #67481
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove unread field in the work coordinator. #67476
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support in LSP code for hosting workspaces that don't keep an independent view of the current solution. #67443
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Gracefully handle unexpected NullableWalker state #67453
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Run analyzers only for requested span #67236
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Preserve parent hoisted variables in nested async `catch` #67122
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove automatic background compiling/parsing in roslyn. #67474
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove concept of metadata assemblies that we dump to recoverable storage. #67470
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change inline hint to inline hints #67475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Don't look to the global.json when we're loading a binlog #67483
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't show expanded items in certain cases #67049
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #67078
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Add support for prioritized diagnostic computation requests in OOP #67392
    Area-Analyzers
  • Null coalescing assignment for nullable value type should set state of nullable type not underlying type #67468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Only call AddDataProtection in Authentication Services that require it #47410
  • IBindFromHttpContext in analyzer message should be IBindableFromHttpContext #47409
  • Add support for X-Azure-FDID as a UseForwardedHeaders "Known Proxy" #47408
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #47407
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #47406
  • Allow configuration of request/response buffer limits for TestServer #47401
  • JwtBearerHandler.cs hardcoded "Bearer " #47399
  • Swagger: Missing Accept-Header #47398
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #47393
  • Bundled Component Nested JS files #47391
  • BindAsync support in RDG doesn't handle implementations inherited from interfaces. #47389
    8.0-preview4

Closed

  • Update gRPC JSON transcoding property priority #47349
    .NET 8 Planning
  • „Method not found: 'Boolean System.Collections.BitArray.HasAllSet()'.” #47208
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #47394
  • Dictionary<string, object> in Form has null value #47383
  • Model binding always fails with decimal and double types when culture number format is different from InvariantCulture #46837
  • ActionMethod URL generation creates invalid URLs when POST action has a different route template #47375
  • question about blazor United? #47390
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #47382

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor HtmlRenderer layering #47404
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [blazor] Configure mono runtime with startupMemoryCache and runtimeOptions #47400
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3
  • Support populating cache without serving from it. #47392
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, feature-output-caching

Merged

  • Update gRPC JSON transcoding to prioritize JSON name #47385
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview4
  • Update Webpack in SignalR #47403
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview4
  • Run quarantined tests on release/8.0 branches #47402
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • [blazor] Configure mono runtime with startupMemoryCache and runtimeOptions #47277
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `9395d4e` to `e4156bd` #47397
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e49c6b9` to `a0ced33` #47396
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime
  • Resolve parent cultures via parent property instead of string process… #47365
    area-mvc, area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview4
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • DbContextHealthCheck handles exceptions thrown by CustomTestQuery #47121
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    area-blazor
  • Move Returns400IfNoMatchingRouteValueForRequiredParam test case to shared RDG/RDF test infra. #47360
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Add support for the large-offset stresslog format. #3779
    DO NOT MERGE, sos

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RadioButton visual does not update properly when enabled/disabled on Android #14195
  • Xamarin.Forms UWP CollectionView Memory leak #14194
  • [Windows] Narrator, NVDA, JAWS screen reader shortcuts have limited functionality #14193
  • [MacCatalyst] Tab and Shift+Tab keyboard navigation is inconsistent #14192
  • [MacCatalyst] Tab does not keyboard navigate away from Editor control #14191
  • [MacCatalyst] SearchBar clear text button not keyboard accessible #14190
  • MSB4044: The "CompileAppManifest" task was not given a value for the required parameter "DefaultSdkVersion" #14189
  • HorizontalOptions/VerticalOptions property to Frame not working , Android .NET 7.0 #14188
  • [Android] Inconsistent first TalkBack focus on navigating to new page #14187
  • [Android] Issues with swiping at the bottom of a ScrollView w/ TalkBack #14186
  • BlazorWebView/WebView2 Transparent background not transparent on Windows #14185
  • Android local pdf file path as source of webview is not displaying #14184
  • MacCatalyst - Menu items are lost when creating new windows and returning to previous windows. #14178
  • HorizontalStackLayout to use full width #14177

Closed

  • Flyout Issue: "ArgumentOutOfRangeException" upon "await Shell.Current.GoToAsync()" #13932
    Backlog
  • Cannot publish .aab MAUI solution #7734
  • Build crashes on iPadOS immediately when using Location #7801
    Backlog
  • Frame behaves differently compared to Xamarin.Forms #10807
    Backlog
  • Secure Storage GetAsync on Android Fails To Return Value #12341
    Backlog
  • MAUI Blazor. Publish iOS. Can not create an IOS archive. Code object is not signed at all. In subcomponent. SQLLitePCLRaw.lib.e_sqllite.ios.aotdata.arm64 #14044

PullRequests

Created

  • Updated Templates for Blazor apps for MacCatalyst #14196
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.3.1 to 4.4.2 #14183
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [WIP] Add first draft color test #14180
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨

Merged

  • [Essentials] Remove lock from SecureStorage #13940
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Make sure that we have valid values for setting the ContentSize of the ScrollView on iOS #14176
  • [net6.0] Updating Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools to 10.0.22621.756 #14106
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Updating Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools to 10.0.22621.756 #14150
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Merge main into net8.0 #14170
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Essentials: Port Xamarin.MediaGallery #13564
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [ios] fix memory leak with `Page` + `Layout` #14108
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [net7.0] Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #14020
    area/drawing ✏️
  • SourceGen now supports internal duplicate types #14171
    area/Xaml </>
  • Expose BlazorWebView.TryDispatchAsync() API for access to scoped services #13425
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android & iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Delete_entity_with_auto_include fails on Sqlite #30577
  • Log Entity Framework queries to new output window source #30576
  • Multiple LeftJoins (GroupJoins) lead to GroupJoin Exception when the same where is used twice #30575
  • "The current provider doesn't have a store type mapping for properties of type" when the value is a subclass #30574
  • AutoInclude causes ExecuteDelete to fail #30572
  • Migration: Changing collation of a PK column fails #30570

Closed

  • Linq select cannot project an entity containing both Json columns and ICollections #30266
    8.0.0
  • PK Constraint error #30573
  • Memory leak when using a shared CancellationTokenSource #30534

PullRequests

Created
